assignParticipantsView.selectNoParticipants: There are no unassigned participants in this room.

draggableList.dragStart: You have lifted a poll. It is in position {{startPosition}} of {{totalCount}} in the list. Use the arrow keys to move, space bar to drop, and escape to cancel.
draggableList.dropped: You have dropped the poll. It has moved from position {{startPosition}} to {{destinationPosition}}.
draggableList.droppedOnNoDropTarget: The poll has been dropped while not over a location. The poll has returned to its starting position of {{startPosition}}.
draggableList.movedPosition: You have moved the poll to position {{position}} of {{totalCount}}.
draggableList.movementCanceled: Movement cancelled. The poll has returned to its starting position of {{startPosition}}.
draggableList.notOverDropTarget: You are currently not dragging over any droppable area.

groupCard.message: Are you sure you want to delete the group “{{title}}”?

participantsList.noDelegate: No delegates have been assigned yet.
participantsList.noRepresentative: No representatives have been assigned yet.

pollForm.noDelegate: No delegates have been assigned yet
pollForm.question: Question (required)
pollForm.title: Title (required)

pollsListUpcomingItem.dragInstructions: . Press space bar to start a drag. When dragging you can use the arrow keys to move the item around and escape to cancel. Ensure your screen reader is in focus mode or forms mode.

pollsPdfDocumentation.closingMessage: You are about to deactivate the PDF download. Are you sure?

conflictMessage.title: Changes in the groups detected.

userHasNoPermissionMessage.delegateHasNoPermission: <0>{{delegate}}</0> has an insufficient power level and will not be able to vote.
userHasNoPermissionMessage.representativeHasNoPermission: <0>{{representative}}</0> cannot represent <4>{{delegate}}</4> because the user has an insufficient power level.

voteView.resultVisibleAfterFirstVote: You will see the result as soon as a first vote has been cast.
